column2: Following the disastrous loss of Iberia to the heathen invaders, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has finally managed to reconquer and unify the peninsula in the name of Christ.
§YMainland Iberia§! has previously been conquered by non-Christians
Every province in §YMainland Iberia§! is owned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] or [Root.GetHerHis] vassals
Every kingdom in §YMainland Iberia§! is added to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s de jure empire:
Following the disastrous loss of Iberia to the heathen invaders, it was [Root.GetTitledFirstName] who finally managed to reconquer and unify the peninsula in the name of Christ.
